title: Estádio Municipal de Abrantes
text:
Estádio Municipal de Abrantes (English: <a href="Abrantes">Abrantes</a> Municipal Stadium) is a <a href="Portugal">Portuguese</a> <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a>, adapted to <a href="Association%20football">Association football</a>, <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> and <a href="sport%20of%20athletics">sport of athletics</a>, inaugurated in 2005.
The <a href="sports%20complex">sports complex</a> where the stadium is located has a <a href="baseball%20park">baseball park</a>, the first in Portugal specially dedicated to the sport of <a href="baseball">baseball</a>.
